title: Self-Directed Gamification-Enhanced Advanced Animal Husbandry Module: PBL-Based Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biological knowledge, understanding of animal classification systems, and concepts of genetic variation
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning combining digital content and physical activities in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can compare animal breeding methods based on taxonomic characteristics (oviparous/viviparous).
Through gamified PBL activities, learners can analyze animal behavioral traits.
Using 3D modeling tools, learners can complete projects involving animal mask creation and breeding simulations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
